response.original_title: Pay Money to My Pain: Live 40
response.overview: Japanese post-hardcore band Pay Money to My Pain performs their 40-song catalogue in this live concert recorded at Shibuya O-East on January 8, 2012.
response.title: Pay Money to My Pain: Live 40

release_dates.note: Available only as a pack-in bonus disc with the Limited Edition copy of the 2012 compilation album "Breakfast".
